profile_data.summary: I am an experienced Business Operations Senior Analyst with a proven track record in the information technology and services sector. My expertise lies in areas such as Analytical Skills, Operations Management, Project Management, Data Analysis, and Logistics Management. I possess a robust background in program and project management. Currently pursuing Master's in Engineering Management from NC State University with an Analytics concentration.
profile_data.headline: Actively seeking full-time position (May Start) | MEM in Analytics @ NCSU | Python, R, SQL, Power BI, Databricks | Project Mgmt & SWE Experience | Ex: Accenture, Datamatics, HCL

experience.description: I spearheaded comprehensive project portfolio reporting, headcount analysis, and annual resource performance assessment, while also overseeing tools management. I established and executed internal protocols across project, contract, facilities management, and communications. Reporting directly to senior leadership, I meticulously tracked and analyzed budget, revenue forecasts, and leakage data. I managed the full cycle of resource operations for 1500+ team members. Additionally, I efficiently supervised Program Administration on SharePoint and automated MIS reporting through Power BI, demonstrating a commitment to optimizing project performance and resource utilization.
experience.title: Business Operations Senior Analyst

experience.description: I conducted comprehensive analysis of logistics data, managing aspects such as supply chain, supplier relations, strategic distribution, and availability. Additionally, I consistently provided in-depth reports on delivery processes, transportation costs, and part procurement. I also played a key role in generating and submitting performance-based logistics reports, offering valuable recommendations for necessary adjustments. Furthermore, I utilized the SAP MM system proficiently to create Purchase Orders, contributing to the efficiency of procurement processes.
experience.title: Associate Consultant

experience.description: I led ETL design, development, and maintenance using Teradata, ensuring seamless data processing. I adeptly resolved Unix code issues during problematic incidents, restoring operations efficiently. Through meticulous analysis, I identified and rectified job failures in production. Additionally, I proficiently designed workflows and worklets in Informatica Power BI, streamlining data workflows. I further enhanced operational efficiency by implementing automation through shell scripts, expediting job status updates and step completions. My expertise extends to Data Warehousing concepts, encompassing OLAP and OLTP, and I possess a strong command of PL/SQL concepts, including Procedures, Functions, Sequences, and Cursors.
experience.title: Software Engineer

projects.description:
• Processed 7,043 customer records for Telco customer dataset, handling missing values and formatting variables for analysis.
• Investigated customer demographics, services, and billing trends to identify patterns correlated with churn using R.
projects.title: R – Teleco Customer Churn Prediction | R

projects.description:
• Developed a database application in MS Access to analyze the Airbnb market and real estate sales. Eight raw datasets from Excel were analyzed, cleaned, and integrated into eight comprehensive tables.
• Used SQL queries, forms, and macros to create a user-friendly rental application in MS Access.
• Designed and deployed Power BI dashboards providing in-depth revenue, utilization, and analysis over four years.
projects.title: Database App. – Airbnb Market Analysis & Real Estate Sales Analysis |

member.occupation: Actively seeking full-time position (May Start) | MEM in Analytics @ NCSU | Python, R, SQL, Power BI, Databricks | Project Mgmt & SWE Experience | Ex: Accenture, Datamatics, HCL

projects.description:
• Used a multi-class classification method to predict obesity risk from a dataset with fifteen features categorized into seven groups.
• Employed Random Forest, KNN, and CNN models to determine the most effective predictor, considering accuracy and performance metrics like - precision, recall, F1-score, and model tuning.
projects.title: Machine Learning – Obesity Risk Classification Model | Random Forest, KNN, CNN, Python
